page_info.title: PAXRay Project
page_info.subtitle: Advanced Chest X-Ray Analysis and Segmentation
page_info.description: Comprehensive tool for automated chest X-ray analysis and anatomical segmentation in medical imaging.

project_overview.title: Project Overview
project_overview.description: PAXRay is an advanced tool for chest X-ray analysis that provides automated segmentation and analysis capabilities for medical imaging. The project focuses on delivering accurate anatomical segmentation and feature extraction from chest X-ray images to support clinical diagnosis.

key_features.title: Anatomical Segmentation
key_features.description: Precise segmentation of chest anatomical structures including lungs, heart, and other thoracic regions for detailed analysis.

key_features.title: AI-Powered Analysis
key_features.description: Advanced machine learning algorithms for automated feature extraction and pathology detection in chest X-ray images.

key_features.title: Clinical Integration
key_features.description: Designed for seamless integration into clinical workflows with standardized output formats and DICOM compatibility.

key_features.title: Open Source
key_features.description: Fully open-source implementation with comprehensive documentation and example usage for research and development.
